H0.text: Windmills are expensive to build is an advantage of using a windmill to obtain usable energy from wind.

H1.text: The wind does not blow all the time is an advantage of using a windmill to obtain usable energy from wind.

H2.text: Pollution is not created by windmills, which is an advantage of using a windmill to obtain usable energy from wind.

H3.text: Populations of birds can be reduced by windmills, which is an advantage of using windmills to obtain usable energy from wind.

A4.text: Wind power consumes no fuel, and emits no local air pollution, unlike fossil fuel power sources.

A5.text: Wind power is one of the lowest-cost electricity sources per unit of energy produced.
